app.mystic_realms.title: Mystic Realms

app.mystic_realms.features:

• Magic-based combat system
• Ancient ruins and puzzles
• Mythical creatures

app.speed_velocity.description: High-stakes urban street racing, customize your exclusive battle car, dominate midnight tracks.
app.speed_velocity.features:
• Realistic driving physics
• Extensive car customization

• Competitive multiplayer
app.zen_garden.title: Zen Garden
app.zen_garden.description: Find inner peace through exquisite puzzles in a serene zen garden.
app.zen_garden.features:
• Relaxing puzzle gameplay
• Beautiful zen garden visuals
• Soothing soundtrack
• Stress-relief mechanics
app.pixel_quest.title: Pixel Quest
app.pixel_quest.description: Classic 8-bit pixel dungeon adventure, hone skills, slay monsters, collect epic equipment.
app.pixel_quest.features:

• Dungeon crawling gameplay
• Character progression system
• Epic boss battles
privacy.section.title: Privacy Protection Statement
privacy.section.content: We highly value the protection of your personal information. Our platform and games are committed to following the principle of minimal data collection.
privacy.data_storage.title: Data Storage:
privacy.data_storage.content: Game progress and preference settings are by default saved only on your local device to ensure data security.
privacy.info_collection.title: Information Collection:
privacy.info_collection.content: We promise not to actively collect sensitive privacy information such as your location, contacts, SMS records, etc.
